text_block_list.text: At Training Timeー

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hello, I'm sorry to bother you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heeh!? Bourbon-san!?
I had Mihono Bourbon come in today as Rice's training partner.
I had Mihono Bourbon come in today as Rice's training partner.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Today I'm just a teammate. Please take care of me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh….

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san, the training that I usually do other people say it's 
“Demonic” apparently.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But as you've already beaten me, I'm sure 
you'll be okay. Let's do our best today.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Fweeh…!!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
“Fweeh” It's not the time for that . Let's start right away. 
Let's run 4 laps around the court!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh, Yes～!
Rice Shower began to run, chased by Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…Now, I should begin training too. After all, the “Emperor Prize” 
in the spring is right around the corner.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to running with Rice Shower in the “Emperor 
Prize”. Right, Trainer-san.
I feel like I need to talk with Mejio McQueen.

But, I'm sure that it also includes the meaning of leaving Rice 
Shower, so all I can say is.
choice_data_list: Rice will surely run at the “Emperor Prize” in the spring.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I believe that too.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What, what!? Rice will also appear in the “Emperor's Award”! 
Quickly spread the story and knead it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait right here! It's not a story to be made public yet!!

In this way, the special training as 
of today marked the new beginning.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
As expected, You managed to quickly finish my Demonic training. 
Now, let's move on to our last training.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice-san, please challenge me and win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… challenge Bourbon-san…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
you've already beaten me at the “Kikkashou Award”. I'm not saying 
the impossible by all means.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But Rice is…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I did not think that Rice-san who showed 
that kind of running was so scared.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
At the “Kikkashou Award” you marked me thoroughly. I could feel 
your determination not to let me go even for a moment.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I thought at that moment, she tried hard 
to beat me and got on that run.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Now I'm working hard to win over Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However… If anyone is the opponent of the current Rice now, They 
will be able to win without much effort.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
That is not what I desire. The Rice-san that I know is not the 
kind of simple opponent you can win against without effort.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Please run, Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Please give me the feeling of “I want 
to win”, just like that time.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to win, feeling….

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I like to run, but I can't win. And that's 
when I saw McQueen-san's race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even Rice wants to win!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …That's right, that's why Rice joined the team and trained a lot…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Even if there are people who are not happy 
when Rice wins, even so Rice still….

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice wants to win!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Finally you've come back. Now let's 
continue with our last training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huh? Rice and Bourbon are gonna race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice-san, she is running looking firmly in front of her.
It reminds me of someone who wants to win.
It reminds me of someone who wants to win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well then, I will go be the judge of the goal!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ha… ha… ha… ha…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
(Bourbon-san is very fast… even faster than 
at the time of the “Kikkashou Award”).

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (Rice wanted to win, that is why I tried very hard…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (Bourbon-san accepted Rice, which everyone didn't approve of)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (Then… I have to respond properly!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaa～～～～!!

It was exactly the same spirit as when Rice won the “Kikkashou 
Award”. The feeling of victory pushes Rice Shower forward.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Goal!! Rice Shower wins!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh… heh～….

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice-san, it was a very wonderful run. Even 
more than that of the “Kikkashou Award”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon-san… Rice ran, I was able to think 
that I wanted to win over Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Me too, I was able to see Rice-san's running again. As a result, 
it seems that I have to train more.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Next up is let's run in the Twinkle Series. As my best rival.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, you see, Rice will enter the “Emperor's Award”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice wants to win. Even if it's a big race for McQueen-san.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haha, that's how I like it.
choice_data_list: Both of you, do your best!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yes!

In this way, Rice Shower decided to go up to the stage of the 
Spring's “Emperor's Award”.
